ValidationRule.description: Don't go to stage 'Value Proposition Presented' until hardware has been reconciled.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( BW_Hardware_Required__c = true, Hardware_Quantity__c < 1, OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Submitted"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract Signed"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Live") ), NOT($User.Email = "tim.moyce@planetpayment.com") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't advance past stage 'Value Proposition Presented' until you reconcile hardware.
